author: Lupin 7
subject: Re: Hrmph
body:
>   Hm?  I must have missed this when it was first posted.
>
>   If you still have it around, copy it and nip over to spamcop.net,

What ever the Doctor orders...

Despite the lack of interest(except for Danny I think); I thought I'd point 
out that the Sansei Street Store is now open. For those who have been 
keeping up with it though, as the site states the Cagliostro lighters were 
the only thing we couldn't get in this shipment; everthing else including 
the Strip Gun, the RC Car, and the big action figures are here.
http://store.sansei.st/

I uploaded 60 screenshots from Mamo to the site; and two new sections. One 
is of interest called, 'Sightings of a Lupin Kind!' Which includes a bunch 
of interesting Lupin pictures not to be found else were. When I was in Tokyo 
last summer, I took a picture of a prominent temple with Tokyo Tower in the 
background; I thought it would make a really nice shot, particularely 
considering the time of day. A few months later I had gotten Tokyo Crisis 
from Bruce and was dumbfounded to see the exact same picture in the movie. 
You know that scene where Goemon is up on the Temple with what looks like 
the Eifal Tower in the background. Bingo. That tower by the way is called 
Tokyo Tower and it is a full scale reproduction of the Eifal Tower.

Just a little bit of Lupin trivia you all can munch on.

David Cummings
lupinsansei_st@yahoo.com
http://lupin.sansei.st/
